channel.title: [Delta] Need Help A.S.A.P
channel.description:
I just got my server online and still when people try to connect using my download client I see this:
[code=java]Connection from (Their IP Address) ClientHandler: Client Null Disconnected <Their IP Address>[/code]
I have also uploaded my server to sites that provide webclient distribution, still no one can connect... I have had only 3 people connect using a client that allows them to change IP's.
Could someone please help me fix this so people can sucessfully log in after downloading my client.
I am willing to use teamviewer, skype or any other type of message/viewing system to fix this.

item.title: [Delta] Need Help A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Aetoc:

Have you looked in server.java or client.java and is there maybe a EGUI.java?

In my server files, I have changed the IP in client.java and server.java
I am wondering if there is anything client sided that I must do.

Also no there is no EGUI.

My server reads online:

bronzerealityv1.zapto.org on port 43594 is currently Online

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Need Help A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

^Not necessarily, but it’s better.

I just want to know what I have to do to get my delta online… where in the client files do i change the ip cause theres no GUI and the only other places i can find 127.0.0.1 are:

aBoolean993 = true; boolean flag = false; String s = method80(true); if(s.endsWith("jagex.com")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("RuneScape.com")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true; if(!flag) { aBoolean1176 = true; return; }

and…

public final URL getCodeBase() { if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://127.0.0.1:" + (80 + anInt958)); }

could someone point me in the right direction?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Need Help A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:7, topic:396539”][quote author=c o l d link=topic=493712.msg3609778#msg3609778 date=1306455643]

I may not know how to fix this, but I have a tip; don’t use anything winterLove based.

Not to sound idiotic…but which came first WL or Delta?

Im using Bronze Age V2 as a base, is it winterLove?
[/quote]
All DeltaScape servers are winterLove based; so yes.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Need Help A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

drew56133:

That client is silab client and they dont work to most severs. i think that you should try a new source and see if it still does then you did somthing wrong like portwording or no-ip. it basic but try a new source and if that dont work pm me

Ok Ill try it out, have any suggested source/clients?

Read full topic
